name: New
instructions:
Note: this step is optional for applicants with access to computer/laptop. We recommend for all applicants to practice by completing the HTML and CSS tutorials

  • Follow the link and download the Sololearn app. Link: https://sololearn.com
  • Make sure you are logged in anytime you work on sololearn, otherwise your progress will be lost.
  • Complete HTML, CSS and JavaScript Fundamentals tutorials.
  • Once you have completed both tutorials fully, Sololearn will generate a certificate for you. Copy the Verification URL of each certificate into a relevant field below. A certificate link will look like this: https://www.sololearn.com/Certificate/1234-12345678/pdf/.
  • If you do not have access to a laptop, submitting the three steps will make you eligible to a laptop loan, so that you can continue with the application process. Please send an email to your closest CYF branch

name: Sololearn
description: Please read and follow the instructions below in order to complete this step. You can do these steps on your smartphone without access to a laptop.
instructions:
Note: this step is optional for applicants with access to computer/laptop. We recommend for all applicants to practice by completing the HTML and CSS tutorials

  • Follow the link and download the Sololearn app. Link: https://sololearn.com
  • Make sure you are logged in anytime you work on sololearn, otherwise your progress will be lost.
  • Complete HTML, CSS and JavaScript Fundamentals tutorials.
  • Once you have completed both tutorials fully, Sololearn will generate a certificate for you. Copy the Verification URL of each certificate into a relevant field below. A certificate link will look like this: https://www.sololearn.com/Certificate/1234-12345678/pdf/.
  • If you do not have access to a laptop, submitting the three steps will make you eligible to a laptop loan, so that you can continue with the application process. Please send an email to your closest CYF branch

name: freeCodeCamp
description: Please read and follow the instructions below in order to complete this step. You should aim to complete this step in 10 days.
instructions:
1. Follow the link and register at freeCodeCamp using this link: https://learn.freecodecamp.org/
  2. Make sure you are logged in anytime you work on freeCodeCamp, otherwise your progress will be lost.
  3. Complete the following tutorials on FreeCodeCamp:
  • Basic HTML and HTML5
  • Basic CSS, Applied Visual Design
  • Applied Accessibility
  • Responsive Web Design Principles
  • CSS Flex box

Once you have completed the tutorials, go to your profile on FreeCodeCamp and change all your privacy settings to public:

  • Go to settings: https://www.freecodecamp.org/settings
  • In Privacy Settings, set all the fields to public (including my profile, my points, my time line).
  • On the top of the page go to 'Show me my public portfolio'
  • Paste the URL link in the field below and click Submit.
  • The link should somethink like this (the last part is your username): https://www.freecodecamp.org/fccfa2c11d1.

name: freeCodeCamp
description: This step challenges you to build your own web page using the skills you learned in the tutorials.
instructions:
• Register and complete the challenge by designing your own web page here using this link: https://learn.freecodecamp.org/../build-a-tribute-page
  • Implement what you have learned from Step 2.
  • Include this test script line in your codepen HTML page:

<script src="https://cdn.freecodecamp.org/testable-projects-fcc/v1/bundle.js"></script>

  • Review the test results and try to improve it
  • Do not copy the HTML/CSS code of the sample FCC page! We want to see your own effort
  • Ensure the page includes a title and an image with a caption
  • When your web page is complete, copy and paste the codepen link to your page in the field below and press Submit.

name: freeCodeCamp
description: This step challenges you to build a product landing page.
instructions:
• Register and complete the challenge by designing your own web page here using this link: https://learn.freecodecamp.org/../build-a-product-landing-page
  • Implement everything you have learned in Steps 2 and 3.
  • This step will be assessed so make sure to complete it to the best of your abilities.
  • We recommend you to read the CYF webpage guideline document HERE
  • Ensure the page includes the test script (as explained in the guideline)
  • Please do not copy the HTML/CSS code of the FCC sample page!
  • When your web page is complete, copy and paste the link to your page in the field below and press Submit.

name: English
description: Write a 300 word motivation letter that answers these questions:
instructions:
• Why you want to join CodeYourFuture?
  • Why you would like to become a professional developer?
  • How much effort are you willing to put in during the course?
  • Why do you consider your background makes you eligible to our program?

name: Programming
description: Understanding programming can be hard. In just a few hours, resources below will help you learn more about programming as you begin this exciting journey!
instructions:
• Read this tutorial on programming: Link https://edu.gcfglobal.org
  • Complete Hour of Code challenge by following this link: Link https://www.khanacademy.org
  • Once you completed the challenge, share your project with us by clicking on ‘Share’ button on CodeAcademy.
  • From the window that pops up, copy the link and submit it in the field below.

name: Internet
header: Introduction to Internet and Search Engines
description: Internet can be scary but resources below will help you to use it in a safe and effective manner.
instructions:
• Complete all 11 sections of this tutorial: Link https://edu.gcfglobal.org/internetbasics
  • Upon completion, take this quiz: Link https://gcflearnfree-assessments.azurewebsites.net
  • Once complete, take a screenshot of the quiz results and save it on your device.
  • Upload the screenshot below.
